refs_b: The hotel seems to be missing the personal details. The hotel is perhaps slightly overrated. This hotel is beautifully set for walking to great sites of the city. There are shops and outdoor restaurants located close-by. The hotel is located within a small complex. The small complex had some beautiful orange trees. The orange trees added to the colourful neighbourhood. The rooms here are really lovely. The rooms were a bit noisy with doors banging. The breakfast buffet was really tasty. The breakfast buffet was a little bit basic. The scrambled eggs are recommended highly. There was some noise coming from the bells of the nearby church. It is recommended to bring earplugs.
refs_comm: The rooms of the hotel are clean. The staff are helpful.
